entry.title: James Webb Space Telescope Deployment Sequence (Nominal)
entry.quote: Engineers on the ground will remotely orchestrate a complex sequence of deployments in the hours and days immediately after the launch of the James Webb Space Telescope. This animation shows the nominal sequence for these deployments.

entry.title: Sequencing your DNA with a USB dongle and open source code
entry.quote: Imagine a hole so tiny that a single strand of DNA can fit through at a time. Push your genetic material through this pore, and the As, Ts, Gs, and Cs that make up a human genome will be revealed in sequence.

entry.title: The worst technology of 2021
entry.quote: Face filters, billionaires in space, and home-buying algorithms that overpay all made our annual list of technology gone wrong.

entry.title: What is the metaverse? 2 media and information experts explain
entry.quote: The metaverse is a concept from science fiction that many people in the technology industry envision as the successor to today’s internet. It’s only a vision at this point, but technology companies like Facebook are aiming to make it the setting for many online activities, including work, play, studying and shopping.

entry.title: TikTok Got More Traffic Than Freakin' Google in 2021
entry.quote: It's no surprise that TikTok is ridiculously popular, but somehow it even beat out Google this year.
